item.title: Brand new hydra blog and documentation portal
item.description: WIP portal for hydra video synth. This will be a home for news and updates regarding hydra, as well as a hub for community resources and documentaiton. For the main hydra website, see the web editor. We welcome contributions!

item.title: hydra meetup #8 is today!
item.description: Join us today at 15:00UTC for hydra meetup #8! There will be talks from hydra microgrant recipients Aida El-Oweidy, David Matunda, and Vagn√© L., as well as a chance for show and tell. Signups at: https://hydra-meetup-8.glitch.me
